scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The series consists of forty-seven photographs consists of copy prints and original photographic materials collected and generated by E. I. "Buddy" Thompson for inclusion in Madam Belle Brezing.
Arrangement: Belle Brezing Portraits; Houses; Belle Brezing's Schools; Belle Brezing Personal Effects; Gravestones; Reproductions from 1874 Scrapbook; Reproductions from Period Newspapers; Misc.
